MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: sudo apt-get install nodejs-legacy sudo apt-get install npm sudo npm install -g azure-cli
sudo apt-get install curl curl -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup | sudo bash - sudo apt-get install -y nodejs sudo npm install -g azure-cli
su - yum update [enter] yum upgrade –y [enter] yum install epel-release [enter] yum install nodejs [enter] yum install npm [enter] npm install -g azure-cli [enter]
